Weather Map

Five day temperature change from now

This is the instructions for using the webpage

This webpage can help users understand the weather conditions in the UK. The cloud icon on the map shows the location of the weather station. You can click on the weather station to learn its name, location, ID, weather conditions near the station, wind speed, and weather forecasts for the next four days.

Head button

Can fill out survey questionnaires

Question mark button

Instructions for use can be opened and closed

Search box in the upper right corner

You can search for the region you want to know and locate it

The plus button on the left

Can reduce perspective

The minus button on the left

Can improve perspective

Arrow button on the left

Can rotate the perspective

The bull's-eye button on the left

Can locate your location

A rectangular button composed of four arrows

Can make the map full screen

Line chart button

You can open and close the Line chart at the lower right corner. The Line chart can display the temperature changes in the next few days

Map button

You can open and close the mini map in the bottom left corner, which can display the location of the map in the UK on the screen
